meanings.definition: To build or construct something in advance.
meanings.sent1: He preerects the stage before the concert.
meanings.sent2: The workers preerect the tents for the camping trip.
meanings.sent3: She preerects the picnic area with colorful decorations.
meanings.sent4: The team preerects a solid foundation for the new building.
meanings.sent5: Preerecting the framework ensures a smooth construction process.

meanings.definition: To prepare or make ready for use.
meanings.sent1: The chef preerects the ingredients for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: They preerect the equipment before the event starts.
meanings.sent3: He preerects his tools neatly in the toolbox.
meanings.sent4: She preerects the study area for maximum productivity.
meanings.sent5: Preerecting the workspace helps save time later on.
